fields.name: Add_from_Catalogue_Heading
fields.fieldText: Add an Indicator from the Catalogue

fields.name: Set_Indicator_IDs_Text
fields.fieldText:
Set Indicator IDs now or later?


All Indicators need to have Indicator IDs set (e.g. 1.1a, 1.1b etc.). Do you want to set these IDs now or later? Check the checkbox below if you want to set them now.

fields.name: Confirm_Info
fields.fieldText:
Confirm Project Indicator details


Indicator: {!fx_Indicator_Full_Name}

Data Type: {!Data_Type}

Result Statement: {!Get_Result_Statement_ID.ampi__Label__c}


Click "Next" to create this Indicator.

fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Oops, something went wrong.


You may have selected an Indicator from the catalogue which has already been added to the Project. Please be sure to only add Indicators that don't yet exist for the Project.


Record that caused the error:

{!Get_Catalogue_Indicator_Details.ampi__Description__c}

{!Get_Catalogue_Indicator_Details_0.ampi__Description__c}

fields.name: Error_Message_0
fields.fieldText:
Oops, something went wrong.


Please contact your system administrator to troubleshoot the issue.

fields.name: Indicator_Order_Letter
fields.helpText: Enter the letter in alphabetic order (a, b, c, d...). Use each letter only once.

validationRule.errorMessage: You may only enter a 1 letter character in this field.
Please enter a value of less than 1000 characters,

fields.name: Type_of_Results
fields.helpText: Select "Input" if you plan to enter the Results yourself. Select "Calculated" if you want the Result to be calculated using a formula.

fields.name: Target_Qualitative
fields.helpText: Inputs are limited to 255 characters.

fields.name: Indicator_Order_Letter_0
fields.helpText: Enter the letter ordering for the indicator, i.e. a, b, c, d, etc..

validationRule.errorMessage: You may only enter a 1 letter character in this field.

fields.name: Start_Flow_Text
fields.fieldText: What do you want to do?

fields.name: Success_Message
fields.fieldText: Project Indicators successfully created. Click next to create another indicator for this result, or click "x" in the top-right to stop.

fields.name: Success_Message_0
fields.fieldText: Project Indicators successfully created. Click next to create another indicator for this result, or click "x" in the top-right to stop.
